Institute-name: The Institute of Cost Accountants of India (ICMAI)
content:
This course deals with Goods and Services Tax. Accordingly, it focuses on explaining the legal provisions associated with levy and collection of CGST and IGST, input tax credit and determination of GST liability. The basic objectives of this Course are:
To acquire knowledge of legal provisions enshrined in laws related to GST and appreciate their applicability in business operations.
To gather understanding of legal provisions of GST laws about matters of compliance while conducting business operations.
